**取值范围**:
- true:被禁用。
- false:未被禁用。

- 1:可继续进行添加步骤。

X-Auth-Token.description:
用户Token。

通过调用IAM服务获取用户Token接口获取(响应消息头中X-Subject-Token的值)。
X-Auth-Token.name: X-Auth-Token

plugins_list.description: CloudBuild capabilities can be called on the pipeline for building.CloudBuild provides an easy-to-use, cloud-based build platform that supports multiple programming languages, helping you achieve continuous delivery, with shorter delivery period and higher delivery efficiency. With CloudBuild, you can create, configure, and run build tasks with a few clicks. CloudBuild also supports automation of code retrieval, building, and packaging, as well as real-time status monitoring.
